title: LR-QAOA
description: The LR-QAOA benchmark schema definition, describing parameters for measuring a successful implementation.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'LR-QAOA' for this schema.

num_qubits.description: Number of qubits in the LR-QAOA circuit(s).

num_layers.description: List with the layers in the LR-QAOA circuits.

delta_beta.description: Slope for beta parameters in the linear function in the LR-QAOA circuits.

delta_gamma.description: Slope for gamma parameters in the linear function in the LR-QAOA circuits.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) per circuit.

trials.description: Number of circuits to generate and measure for the LR-QAOA test.

confidence_level.description: Confidence level for establishing LR-QAOA success criteria. Must be between 0 and 1.
